name: Compound
description: Compound is a decentralized blockchain protocol that allows users to lend or borrow selected cryptocurrencies. It establishes money markets by pooling assets together and algorithmically setting interest rates based on supply and demand of assets. COMP tokens are used for protocol governance.

en.description: Compound is a decentralized blockchain protocol that allows users to lend or borrow selected cryptocurrencies. It establishes money markets by pooling assets together and algorithmically setting interest rates based on supply and demand of assets. COMP tokens are used for protocol governance.

tr.description: Bileşik, kullanıcıların seçilen kripto para birimlerini ödünç vermelerini veya ödünç almalarını sağlayan merkezi olmayan bir blok zinciri protokolüdür. Varlıkları bir araya toplayarak ve varlıkların arz ve talebine göre faiz oranlarını algoritmik olarak belirleyerek para piyasaları kurar. COMP belirteçleri, protokol yönetimi için kullanılır.

vi.description: Compound is a decentralized blockchain protocol that allows users to lend or borrow selected cryptocurrencies. It establishes money markets by pooling assets together and algorithmically setting interest rates based on supply and demand of assets. COMP tokens are used for protocol governance.

zh.description: Compound 是个去中心化区块链协议，允许用户存入或借出协议支持的加密资产。Compound 通过资金池的方式来建立货币市场，并根据市场供需通过算法来调整利率。COMP 是其协议的治理代币。

hi.description: Compound एक विकेन्द्रीकृत ब्लॉकचेन प्रोटोकॉल है जो उपयोगकर्ताओं को चयनित क्रिप्टोकरेंसी को उधार देने या उधार लेने की अनुमति देता है। यह परिसंपत्तियों को एक साथ पूल करके और परिसंपत्तियों की आपूर्ति और मांग के आधार पर ब्याज दरों को निर्धारित करके मुद्रा बाजार स्थापित करता है। COMP टोकन का उपयोग प्रोटोकॉल शासन के लिए किया जाता है।
